title: Yorkshire puddings with rib of beef and seasonal cabbage
description: This Yorkshire pudding recipe is very special - it's from James Martin's grandmother - and it's the perfect partner for this luxurious cut of beef.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
4kg 28-day-old forerib of beef, on the bone
1 savoy cabbage, core removed, finely sliced
beef jus or gravy, to serve
